questionTitle: ___ stereophonic phonograph records, two recordings are made of the same musical performance
The colours of a rainbow ___ arranged in the same order.
Billie Holiday's reputation as a great jazz-blues singer rests on her ability __________emotional depth to her songs.
Since the earth's crust is much thicker under the continents, equipment would have to be capable of drilling through 100,000 feet of rock to investigate the mantle ________ .
If one is suffering from a psychosomatic illness, that is, a disease contributed to by mental anxiety, one may still feel very ________ .
Considered unique and exotic, ________.
anwers: over 4,000 American households keep the llama as a pet
there are over 4,000 American households that keep the llama as a pet
the llama is kept as a pet in over 4,000 American households
the llama kept as a pet in over 4,000 American households

questionTitle: ________ can be grown on arid land.
The skiers would rather________ through the mountains than go by bus.
________ people came to the meeting than we had expected.
Ancient civilizations such as the Phoneticians and the Mesopotamians ________ goods rather than use money.
The flamingo uses its bill ________ feeding to filter mud and water from the tiny plants and animals it finds in shallow ponds.
The freshman read an advertisement ________ the newspaper about an apartment to rent.
________ apples are grown in Washington State.
________ Java Man, who lived before the first Ice Age,is the first manlike animal.
Although they are smaller, chipmunks are ________ most other ground squirrels.
In New England ________ picturesque fishing villages and manufacturing towns.
The bank sent a notice to its customers which contained ________.
anwers: a remembrance that interest rates were to rise the following month
a reminder that a raise in interest rates was the month following
to remember that the interest rates was going up next month
a reminder that the interest rates would raise the following month

questionTitle: If one of the participants in a conversation wonders ________, no real communication has taken place.
anwers: what did the other person say
what was the other person say

questionTitle: The Irish brought the popular custom of Halloween to America ________ 1840s.
When Henry arrived home after a hard day at work, ________.
